nodes.id: 大军区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军（主要是陆军）曾经存在的一级军事组织。
description.en: A former first-level military organization of the People's Liberation Army (primarily the Ground Force).

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的陆上作战部队。
description.en: The ground force of the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 百万大裁军

description.zh-cn: 1985年中国人民解放军进行的精简整编，裁减员额100万，并将十一大军区调整为七大军区。
description.en: A 1985 streamlining and reorganization of the People's Liberation Army, which reduced its personnel by one million and restructured the eleven military regions into seven.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军北京军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北京军区

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军七大军区之一，主要负责首都北京的卫戍工作。
description.en: Formerly one of the seven military regions of the PLA, primarily responsible for the garrison of the capital, Beijing.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军沈阳军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军沈阳军区

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军七大军区之一，主管中国东北地区军事事务。
description.en: Formerly one of the seven military regions of the PLA, responsible for military affairs in Northeast China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军济南军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军济南军区

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军七大军区之一，主管山东、河南两省军事事务，并作为战略总预备队。
description.en: Formerly one of the seven military regions of the PLA, responsible for military affairs in Shandong and Henan provinces, and served as the strategic reserve.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军南京军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军南京军区

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军七大军区之一，主管华东五省一市军事事务，并承担对台作战任务。
description.en: Formerly one of the seven military regions of the PLA, responsible for military affairs in five provinces and one city in East China, and was tasked with operations concerning Taiwan.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军广州军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军广州军区

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军七大军区之一，主管中南五省军事事务。
description.en: Formerly one of the seven military regions of the PLA, responsible for military affairs in five provinces in South Central China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军成都军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军成都军区

description.zh-cn: 前身为1950年设立的西南军区，1955年改设为成都军区，曾是中国人民解放军七大军区之一，主管中国西南地区军事事务。
description.en: Formerly the Southwest Military Region established in 1950, it was reorganized as the Chengdu Military Region in 1955. It was one of the seven military regions of the PLA, responsible for military affairs in Southwest China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军兰州军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军兰州军区

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军七大军区之一，主管中国西北地区军事事务。
description.en: Formerly one of the seven military regions of the PLA, responsible for military affairs in Northwest China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军战区

description.zh-cn: 2016年军事改革后取代大军区体制的军事组织，设立五大战区。
description.en: A military organization that replaced the military region system after the 2016 military reform, establishing five theater commands.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军武汉军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军武汉军区

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军十一大军区之一，1985年裁撤并入广州军区。
description.en: Formerly one of the eleven military regions of the PLA, it was disbanded and merged into the Guangzhou Military Region in 1985.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军福州军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军福州军区

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军十一大军区之一，1985年裁撤并入南京军区。
description.en: Formerly one of the eleven military regions of the PLA, it was disbanded and merged into the Nanjing Military Region in 1985.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军昆明军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军昆明军区

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军十一大军区之一，1985年裁撤并入成都军区。
description.en: Formerly one of the eleven military regions of the PLA, it was disbanded and merged into the Chengdu Military Region in 1985.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军新疆军区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军新疆军区

description.zh-cn: 曾是十一大军区之一，1985年后并入兰州军区，但仍为副大军区级单位。
description.en: Formerly one of the eleven military regions, it was merged into the Lanzhou Military Region after 1985 but retained its status as a deputy military region-level unit.

nodes.id: 毛泽东

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和领导人。
description.en: A primary founder and leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 叶剑英

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国开国元勋，中国人民解放军的创建者和领导者之一。
description.en: A founding father of the People's Republic of China and one of the founders and leaders of the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 八大军区司令员对调

description.zh-cn: 1973年12月，为防止军区司令员形成私人势力，中共中央军委对八大军区司令员进行了调动。
description.en: In December 1973, the CPC Central Military Commission transferred the commanders of eight major military regions to prevent them from forming personal power bases.

nodes.id: 东北人民解放军

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期六大军区之一，前身为东北人民解放军。
description.en: One of the six major military regions in the early days of the People's Republic of China, formerly the Northeast People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 华北军区

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期六大军区之一，1955年改组为北京军区。
description.en: One of the six major military regions in the early days of the People's Republic of China, reorganized into the Beijing Military Region in 1955.

nodes.id: 聂荣臻

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国开国元勋，中国人民解放军的创建者和领导者之一。
description.en: A founding father of the People's Republic of China and one of the founders and leaders of the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 薄一波

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的早期领导人之一。
description.en: One of the early leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 晋察冀边区

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期中国共产党领导的敌后抗日根据地之一。
description.en: One of the anti-Japanese base areas led by the Communist Party of China behind enemy lines during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

nodes.id: 晋冀鲁豫边区

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期中国共产党领导的敌后抗日根据地之一。
description.en: One of the anti-Japanese base areas led by the Communist Party of China behind enemy lines during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

nodes.id: 华东军区

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期六大军区之一。
description.en: One of the six major military regions in the early days of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 华中军区

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期设立的军区，后改称中南军区。
description.en: A military region established in the early days of the People's Republic of China, later renamed the Central South Military Region.

nodes.id: 中南军区

description.zh-cn: 由华中军区改称而来，是中华人民共和国成立初期六大军区之一。
description.en: Renamed from the Central China Military Region, it was one of the six major military regions in the early days of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 西北军区

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期六大军区之一。
description.en: One of the six major military regions in the early days of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 贺龙

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国开国元勋，中国人民解放军的创建者和领导者之一。
description.en: A founding father of the People's Republic of China and one of the founders and leaders of the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 习仲勋

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的早期领导人之一。
description.en: One of the early leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军北京卫戍区

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北京卫戍区

description.zh-cn: 负责保卫首都北京的军队组织。
description.en: A military organization responsible for the defense of the capital, Beijing.

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军天津警备区

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在天津市设立的军队组织。
description.en: A military organization of the PLA established in Tianjin.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在河北省设立的军队组织。

description.en: A military organization of the PLA established in Shanxi Province.

relationships.source: 大军区
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军

description.zh-cn: 大军区是中国人民解放军曾经存在的一级组织。
description.en: The Grand Military Region was a former first-level organization of the People's Liberation Army.

relationships.source: 大军区
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军

description.zh-cn: 大军区主要是中国人民解放军陆军的一级组织。
description.en: The Grand Military Region was primarily a first-level organization of the PLA Ground Force.

relationships.source: 百万大裁军
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军武汉军区

description.zh-cn: 在1985年百万大裁军中，武汉军区被撤销。
description.en: During the one-million-man troop reduction in 1985, the Wuhan Military Region was disbanded.

relationships.source: 百万大裁军
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军福州军区

description.zh-cn: 在1985年百万大裁军中，福州军区被撤销。
description.en: During the one-million-man troop reduction in 1985, the Fuzhou Military Region was disbanded.

relationships.source: 百万大裁军
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军昆明军区

description.zh-cn: 在1985年百万大裁军中，昆明军区被撤销。
description.en: During the one-million-man troop reduction in 1985, the Kunming Military Region was disbanded.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军武汉军区
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军广州军区

description.zh-cn: 1985年大裁军中，武汉军区并入广州军区。
description.en: In the 1985 military reduction, the Wuhan Military Region was merged into the Guangzhou Military Region.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军福州军区
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军南京军区

description.zh-cn: 1985年大裁军中，福州军区并入南京军区。
description.en: In the 1985 military reduction, the Fuzhou Military Region was merged into the Nanjing Military Region.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军昆明军区
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军成都军区

description.zh-cn: 1985年大裁军中，昆明军区并入成都军区。
description.en: In the 1985 military reduction, the Kunming Military Region was merged into the Chengdu Military Region.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军新疆军区
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军兰州军区

description.zh-cn: 1985年大裁军中，新疆军区并入兰州军区。
description.en: In the 1985 military reduction, the Xinjiang Military Region was merged into the Lanzhou Military Region.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军战区
relationships.target: 大军区

description.zh-cn: 2016年2月1日，七大军区改组为五大战区，大军区编制被正式撤销。
description.en: On February 1, 2016, the seven military regions were reorganized into five theater commands, and the military region establishment was formally abolished.

relationships.source: 叶剑英
relationships.target: 八大军区司令员对调

description.zh-cn: 叶剑英向毛泽东建议进行八大军区司令员对调。
description.en: Ye Jianying suggested to Mao Zedong to carry out the transfer of the commanders of the eight military regions.

relationships.source: 毛泽东
relationships.target: 八大军区司令员对调

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东采纳了叶剑英的建议，安排了八大军区司令员对调。
description.en: Mao Zedong adopted Ye Jianying's suggestion and arranged the transfer of the commanders of the eight military regions.

relationships.source: 晋察冀边区
relationships.target: 华北军区

description.zh-cn: 原晋察冀军区和晋冀鲁豫军区合并设立华北军区。
description.en: The former Jin-Cha-Ji Military Region and Jin-Ji-Lu-Yu Military Region merged to establish the North China Military Region.

relationships.source: 晋冀鲁豫边区
relationships.target: 华北军区

description.zh-cn: 原晋冀鲁豫军区和晋察冀军区合并设立华北军区。
description.en: The former Jin-Ji-Lu-Yu Military Region and Jin-Cha-Ji Military Region merged to establish the North China Military Region.

relationships.source: 聂荣臻
relationships.target: 华北军区

relationships.source: 薄一波
relationships.target: 华北军区

relationships.source: 贺龙
relationships.target: 西北军区

description.zh-cn: 1948年2月6日任陕甘宁晋绥联防军区司令员，该军区后于1949年2月1日改称西北军区。
description.en: Appointed commander of the Shaan-Gan-Ning-Jin-Sui Joint Defense Military Region on February 6, 1948, which was renamed the Northwest Military Region on February 1, 1949.

relationships.source: 习仲勋
relationships.target: 西北军区

description.zh-cn: 1948年2月6日任陕甘宁晋绥联防军区政委，该军区后于1949年2月1日改称西北军区。
description.en: Appointed political commissar of the Shaan-Gan-Ning-Jin-Sui Joint Defense Military Region on February 6, 1948, which was renamed the Northwest Military Region on February 1, 1949.

relationships.source: 华中军区
relationships.target: 中南军区

description.zh-cn: 1950年1月，华中军区改名为中南军区。
description.en: In January 1950, the Central China Military Region was renamed the Central South Military Region.

relationships.source: 华北军区
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军北京军区

description.zh-cn: 1955年4月14日，由原华北军区重组建立北京军区。
description.en: On April 14, 1955, the Beijing Military Region was established through the reorganization of the former North China Military Region.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军北京卫戍区
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军北京军区

description.zh-cn: 北京卫戍区隶属于北京军区。
description.en: The Beijing Garrison was subordinate to the Beijing Military Region.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军天津警备区
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军北京军区

description.zh-cn: 天津警备区隶属于北京军区。
description.en: The Tianjin Garrison was subordinate to the Beijing Military Region.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军河北省军区
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军北京军区

description.zh-cn: 河北省军区隶属于北京军区。
description.en: The Hebei Provincial Military District was subordinate to the Beijing Military Region.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军山西省军区
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军北京军区

description.zh-cn: 山西省军区隶属于北京军区。
description.en: The Shanxi Provincial Military District was subordinate to the Beijing Military Region.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军内蒙古军区
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军北京军区

description.zh-cn: 1967年5月，内蒙古军区降级为省级军区，编入北京军区。在此之前及之后，也隶属于北京军区管辖范围。
description.en: In May 1967, the Inner Mongolia Military Region was downgraded to a provincial military district and incorporated into the Beijing Military Region. Before and after this period, it was also under the jurisdiction of the Beijing Military Region.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军辽宁省军区
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军沈阳军区

description.zh-cn: 辽宁省军区隶属于沈阳军区。
description.en: The Liaoning Provincial Military District was subordinate to the Shenyang Military Region.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军吉林省军区
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军沈阳军区

description.zh-cn: 吉林省军区隶属于沈阳军区。
description.en: The Jilin Provincial Military District was subordinate to the Shenyang Military Region.

description.zh-cn: 黑龙江省军区隶属于沈阳军区。

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军济南军区

description.zh-cn: 山东省军区隶属于济南军区。
description.en: The Shandong Provincial Military District was subordinate to the Jinan Military Region.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军济南军区

description.zh-cn: 河南省军区隶属于济南军区。
description.en: The Henan Provincial Military District was subordinate to the Jinan Military Region.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军南京军区

description.zh-cn: 上海警备区隶属于南京军区。
description.en: The Shanghai Garrison was subordinate to the Nanjing Military Region.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军南京军区

description.zh-cn: 江苏省军区隶属于南京军区。
description.en: The Jiangsu Provincial Military District was subordinate to the Nanjing Military Region.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军南京军区

description.zh-cn: 浙江省军区隶属于南京军区。
description.en: The Zhejiang Provincial Military District was subordinate to the Nanjing Military Region.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军南京军区

description.zh-cn: 福建省军区隶属于南京军区。
description.en: The Fujian Provincial Military District was subordinate to the Nanjing Military Region.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军南京军区

description.zh-cn: 安徽省军区隶属于南京军区。
description.en: The Anhui Provincial Military District was subordinate to the Nanjing Military Region.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军南京军区

description.zh-cn: 江西省军区隶属于南京军区。
description.en: The Jiangxi Provincial Military District was subordinate to the Nanjing Military Region.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军广东省军区
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军广州军区

description.zh-cn: 广东省军区隶属于广州军区。
description.en: The Guangdong Provincial Military District was subordinate to the Guangzhou Military Region.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军广西军区
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军广州军区

description.zh-cn: 广西军区隶属于广州军区。
description.en: The Guangxi Military District was subordinate to the Guangzhou Military Region.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军湖北省军区
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军广州军区

description.zh-cn: 湖北省军区隶属于广州军区。
description.en: The Hubei Provincial Military District was subordinate to the Guangzhou Military Region.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军湖南省军区
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军广州军区

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军成都军区

description.zh-cn: 四川省军区隶属于成都军区。
description.en: The Sichuan Provincial Military District was subordinate to the Chengdu Military Region.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军西藏军区
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军成都军区

description.zh-cn: 1968年12月，西藏军区降级为省级军区，编入成都军区。
description.en: In December 1968, the Tibet Military Region was downgraded to a provincial military district and incorporated into the Chengdu Military Region.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军贵州省军区
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军成都军区

description.zh-cn: 贵州省军区隶属于成都军区。
description.en: The Guizhou Provincial Military District was subordinate to the Chengdu Military Region.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军成都军区

description.zh-cn: 云南省军区隶属于成都军区。
description.en: The Yunnan Provincial Military District was subordinate to the Chengdu Military Region.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军成都军区

description.en: The Chongqing Garrison was subordinate to the Chengdu Military Region.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军兰州军区

description.zh-cn: 甘肃省军区隶属于兰州军区。
description.en: The Gansu Provincial Military District was subordinate to the Lanzhou Military Region.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军兰州军区

description.en: The Shaanxi Provincial Military District was subordinate to the Lanzhou Military Region.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军宁夏军区

description.zh-cn: 宁夏军区隶属于兰州军区。
description.en: The Ningxia Military District was subordinate to the Lanzhou Military Region.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军新疆军区
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军兰州军区

description.zh-cn: 新疆军区在1985年大裁军后隶属于兰州军区。
description.en: After the 1985 military reduction, the Xinjiang Military Region became subordinate to the Lanzhou Military Region.
